table_foot: The three groups did not differ regarding age, sex, years of education, cerebrovascular burden and Fazekas score.Numbers represent means±SD (range) unless otherwise indicated.*Significant at the p<0.05 level.†Alzheimer's disease—mild cognitive impairment.‡Parkinson's disease.§Mini-Mental State Examination.¶Global Deterioration Scale, category 1=normal, category 2=subjective cognitive impairment, category 3=mild cognitive impairment.**Composite score from 0 to 6 were 0 indicates no cerebrovascular burden, 6 indicates a maximum disease burden.
